title: 2010 PGA Tour of Australasia
text:
The 2010 PGA Tour of Australasia is a series of men's professional <a href="golf">golf</a> events played mainly in Australia and New Zealand. The main tournaments on the <a href="PGA%20Tour%20of%20Australasia">PGA Tour of Australasia</a> are played in the southern summer so they are split between the first and last months of the year.
Schedule.
The table below shows the 2010 schedule. It only lists official money events on the tour. The number in brackets after each winner's name is the number of PGA Tour of Australasia events he had won up to and including that tournament. This information is only shown for PGA Tour of Australasia members.
